system.sustained: Make Focus Power test to listen to the secrets of the warp. Gaining +10 to one WS, BS, or Skill Test per Round, for one round + 1 per Degree of Success on test. The bonus takes effect at the start of psyker's next turn. The Psyker can alternatively learn one secret about a target within line of sight, with the significance of the secret determined by Degrees of Success (GM Discretion), however before revealing a secret, GM should roll 1d10, on an 8+, the secret is a lie (-1 per Degree of Success, as more important secrets are more likely to be lies).
